label: 律
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: a general term for penal laws, also used for the Buddhist precepts (Vinaya). The Ritsu school (Risshu) was one of the early Buddhist schools imported into Japan. There were ritsu temples and ritsu monks.
